text: hi all, please update via slack today
finishing BLE scan and cap control on the gateway
goal is to show blinking lights tomorrow for our meeting
Minor enhancements and figuring out how to access the Cloud Vision preview.
Also, my schedule is super light this week so I’m happy to help with anything. :wink:
<@U0261PCRQ|kat> has left the channel

Batteries have arrived. Ordered other components that should be here today or tomorrow. Kevin and shashi are both very busy so syncing up re: sommely caps post-ble will either happen on our call tomorrow or sometime next week.
Could we draft up a status note to send using Reportedly for our call tomorrow?
maybe break it down by design, hw, sw, and Intel needs.
and spice it up with some of the photos Ewald captured this morning of the rig.
I know that <@U02618EV1> and <@U02AUNA0P> are planning to work with <@U026103R3> tomorrow morning to capture a video update of this week’s progress
just want to make sure all the threads get combined
cool - let’s maybe get everything else (text wise) lined up and  we can embed the video into the update before we send it out
sounds good

Also, reminder that we’re tracking what to shoot tomorrow on this google doc if you have anything to add/remove <https://docs.google.com/a/uncorkedstudios.com/document/d/1csxxPc__27Y0qloeGEQhENA5vWyvWmCoQ1WWottylQM/edit?usp=sharing>
Sorry testing a new plug in.
will delete
minor update: developing on the Edison inside the wine bottle now. WiFi and BLE both looking good.
Sweet
I have a vet appointment tomorrow so I may need to call into our Sommely meeting.
thanks for the heads up marce!
is shashi coming by the office?
i was just about to email him to find out
cool.
depending on how that goes, I may be back in to meet up with him.
I have a call w/ him and Marc on Monday which is top of my sommely list
got around to evaluating the esp8266 chip just now on the bench. it's a 2.4Ghz 802.11 soc for $1.46
<http://world.taobao.com/item/42107731541.htm?fromSite=main&spm=a312a.7700824.w4004-10057817917.6.KSvOfP>
